title: MyPet的玩家权限是什么
author: q1021768575
txt_content: 求指令 求 给权限的

replies.author: xujh
replies.txt_content:
manuaddp ID MyPet.user.capturehelper
manuaddp ID MyPet.user.keep.宠物
manuaddp ID MyPet.user.leash.宠物
manuaddp ID MyPet.user.release

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content:
- MyPet.custom.skilltree.ppp
    - MyPet.user.command.release
    - MyPet.user.command.respawn
    - MyPet.user.leash.*
